mapper.select: SELECT sb.trade_seq, sb.sale_title, sb.book_st, sb.sale_cont, sb.sale_price, sb.delivery_cost, sb.sale_rg, sb.sale_st, sb.sale_st_dtm, sb.views, sb.wish_cnt, sb.book_sale_dtm, sb.post_no, sb.addr_h, sb.addr_d, sb.recipient_ph, sb.recipient_nm, sb.crt_dtm, sb.upd_dtm, sb.payment_type, sb.category_nm, sb.book_title, sb.book_author, sb.book_publisher, sb.book_org_price, sb.book_img FROM sb_trade_info AS sb WHERE sb.trade_seq = #{trade_seq}
SELECT img_url FROM book_image WHERE trade_seq = #{trade_seq} ORDER BY SORT_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sb_trade_info ( sale_title, book_img, book_title, book_author, book_publisher, book_org_price, isbn, category_nm, book_st, sale_cont, sale_price, delivery_cost, sale_rg, ) VALUES ( #{sale_title}, #{book_img}, #{book_title}, #{book_author}, #{book_publisher}, #{book_org_price}, #{isbn}, #{category_nm}, #{book_st}, #{sale_cont}, #{sale_price}, #{delivery_cost}, #{sale_rg} )
